recipes.title: Classic Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipes.description: Soft and chewy chocolate chip cookies perfect for any occasion.
steps: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
Mix flour, baking soda, and salt in a bowl.
Cream together butter, brown sugar, and white sugar in another bowl.
Add vanilla and eggs to the wet mixture, one at a time.
Combine the wet and dry ingredients, then fold in chocolate chips.
Drop spoonfuls of dough onto a baking sheet and bake for 10-12 minutes.

recipes.title: Vegetarian Pasta Primavera
recipes.description: A healthy and colorful pasta dish loaded with fresh vegetables.
ingredients: 12 oz pasta (spaghetti, penne, or your choice)
steps: Cook pasta according to package instructions.
Sauté garlic in olive oil until fragrant.
Add broccoli, zucchini, and bell pepper; cook for 5-7 minutes.
Stir in cherry tomatoes and cook for 2 minutes.
Toss the vegetables with cooked pasta.
Season with salt and pepper and serve with Parmesan, if desired.

recipes.title: Spicy Chicken Curry
recipes.description: A flavorful and spicy chicken curry made with aromatic spices.
ingredients: 1 lb chicken breast, cut into pieces
steps: Heat oil and sauté onions until golden brown.
Add garlic, ginger, curry powder, and cayenne; cook for 1-2 minutes.
Add chicken pieces and cook until browned.
Pour in coconut milk and simmer for 20 minutes.
Season with salt and garnish with cilantro before serving.

recipes.title: Vegan Avocado Toast
recipes.description: A quick and healthy breakfast featuring creamy avocado and whole-grain toast.
ingredients: Optional toppings: red pepper flakes, cherry tomatoes, sprouts
steps: Toast the bread slices until golden.
Mash avocado with olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Spread the avocado mixture on the toast.
Add optional toppings as desired.

recipes.title: Gluten-Free Pancakes
recipes.description: Fluffy pancakes made with gluten-free flour, perfect for breakfast.
ingredients: 2 tbsp melted butter or coconut oil
steps: Mix dry ingredients in a bowl.
Whisk wet ingredients in another bowl.
Combine wet and dry ingredients until smooth.
Pour batter onto a hot greased skillet and cook until bubbles form.
Flip and cook for another 1-2 minutes.

recipes.title: Thai Green Curry
recipes.description: A rich and aromatic Thai green curry made with coconut milk and fresh vegetables.
steps: Heat green curry paste in a pan until fragrant.
Stir in coconut milk and bring to a simmer.
Add vegetables and tofu; cook for 5-7 minutes.
Season with soy sauce and fish sauce.
Serve over rice and garnish with fresh basil.

recipes.title: Caprese Salad
recipes.description: A simple and refreshing Italian salad made with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil.
steps: Layer tomato and mozzarella slices on a plate.
Tuck basil leaves between slices.
Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic vinegar.
Season with salt and pepper before serving.

recipes.title: American Cheeseburger
recipes.description: A classic cheeseburger with all the fixings.
steps: Season ground beef with salt and pepper and form patties.
Cook patties on a grill or skillet for 3-4 minutes per side.
Add cheese slices during the last minute of cooking.
Assemble burgers with buns, patties, and toppings of choice.

recipes.title: Japanese Sushi Rolls
recipes.description: Homemade sushi rolls filled with fresh ingredients.
ingredients: Fillings: cucumber, avocado, cooked shrimp, raw fish, etc.
Soy sauce and wasabi, for serving
steps: Cook sushi rice according to package instructions and season with rice vinegar.
Place a sheet of nori on a bamboo mat.
Spread rice over the nori, leaving a small edge bare.
Add fillings and roll tightly.
Cut into pieces and serve with soy sauce and wasabi.

recipes.title: Paleo Meatballs
recipes.description: Juicy meatballs made with almond flour and herbs, perfect for a Paleo diet.
steps: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Mix all ingredients in a bowl until well combined.
Form the mixture into meatballs and place on a baking sheet.
Bake for 20-25 minutes or until cooked through.

recipes.title: Keto Cauliflower Pizza Crust
recipes.description: A low-carb pizza crust made from cauliflower, perfect for keto diets.
steps: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
Steam the cauliflower and squeeze out excess water.
Mix cauliflower, mozzarella, egg, garlic powder, and salt.
Form the mixture into a crust on a parchment-lined baking sheet.
Bake for 15-20 minutes, then add toppings and bake for another 5-10 minutes.

recipes.title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
recipes.description: Bell peppers stuffed with a savory mix of quinoa, beans, and sp
ingredients: 4 bell peppers, tops cut off and seeds removed
steps: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Mix quinoa, beans, corn, cumin, and chili powder in a bowl.
Stuff the bell peppers with the mixture and place them in a baking dish.
Top with cheese, if using, and bake for 25-30 minutes.

recipes.title: Mediterranean Chickpea Salad
recipes.description: A refreshing salad with chickpeas, cucumbers, olives, and feta cheese.
ingredients: 1/2 cup Kalamata olives, pitted and sliced
steps: Combine chickpeas, cucumber, olives, and feta in a large bowl.
Drizzle with olive oil and red wine vinegar.
Toss to combine and season with salt and pepper.

recipes.title: Eggplant Parmesan
recipes.description: Breaded and baked eggplant slices topped with marinara sauce and mozzarella cheese.
steps: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Dip eggplant slices in beaten egg, then coat in breadcrumb mixture.
Arrange the breaded eggplant on a baking sheet and bake for 20 minutes.
Top with marinara sauce and mozzarella, then bake for an additional 10 minutes.

recipes.title: Sweet Potato Fries
recipes.description: Crispy baked sweet potato fries, a healthier alternative to regular fries.
ingredients: 2 large sweet potatoes, cut into fries
steps: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C).
Toss sweet potato fries with olive oil, paprika, garlic powder, and salt.
Spread fries in a single layer on a baking sheet.
Bake for 25-30 minutes, flipping halfway through.

recipes.title: Low-Carb Zucchini Noodles
recipes.description: Zucchini noodles sautéed with garlic and olive oil, a great low-carb alternative to pasta.
steps: Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat.
Add garlic and sauté until fragrant.
Add zucchini noodles and cook for 3-5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Season with salt and pepper before serving.

recipes.title: Christmas Sugar Cookies
recipes.description: Delicious, buttery sugar cookies perfect for the holiday season.
steps: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
Cream together butter and sugar until fluffy.
Add egg and vanilla, and mix well.
Gradually add flour, baking soda, and salt.
Roll dough into balls and flatten on a baking sheet.
Bake for 10-12 minutes.

recipes.title: Valentine’s Day Red Velvet Cupcakes
recipes.description: Rich and moist red velvet cupcakes topped with cream cheese frosting.
steps: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
Mix dry ingredients in one bowl, wet ingredients in another.
Combine the two and mix until smooth.
Fill cupcake liners and bake for 18-20 minutes.

recipes.title: Easter Lemon Bars
recipes.description: Tangy and sweet lemon bars with a buttery crust, perfect for Easter.
steps: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
Mix flour and powdered sugar, then cut in butter to form the crust.
Press into a pan and bake for 15 minutes.
Whisk remaining ingredients for the filling and pour over the crust.
Bake for an additional 20-25 minutes until set.

recipes.title: Birthday Chocolate Cake
recipes.description: A rich and moist chocolate cake, perfect for a birthday celebration.
steps: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
Mix dry ingredients in a bowl.
Add eggs, milk, oil, and vanilla, then mix until smooth.
Stir in boiling water to create a thin batter.
Pour into greased cake pans and bake for 30-35 minutes.
